name: Reading Journal App
description: As an avid reader, I often find that there aren't many journaling apps that are targeted specifically for reading. Hence, I built an app in Java that allows user to upload books/PDFs and journal on them with the app.

name: Water Level Sensor (Physics Project)
description: To assist myself in the measurement of the velocity of water and its rate of change for a physics project, I made a device using Arduino to track the water level at a certain interval.

name: B2B E-Commerce site with an inventory management system
description: One of my earliest and largest project which involves creating a web app that allows businesses to track inventory as well as let their clients purchase products directly on the website to ease communication.

name: Tourism Website
description: When I started to feel homesick, I created a website promoting tourism relating to my home country. The website has a built-in ticket price searching system, utilising a plane ticket API

name: Mini Command Shell Written in C
description: This command shell written in C has some standard linux functions (cd, grep, echo, etc), utilising principles such as piping and supports multiple commands

name: Image Compression Using C
description: For this project, I programmed several algorithms to compress images based on pixel values. Worked with low-level binary data as well as plain text.

name: Front-End Design
description: Worked as a group to develop the front-end design for a video sharing app.
